website_summaries.verdict: A spacious and sleek bottom freezer fridge that’s perfect for families and offers plenty of convenient features users love.
pros: Freezer drawer for easy access to frozen foods
separate drawer that houses ice maker
Alarm alerts you when door is left open
cons: Some owners complain that the ice maker is unreliable

customer_reviews.title: So far it works great, like it alot
customer_reviews.text: Took me awhile to get ice maker to work.But other than that everything seems to be alright. But we’ll see down the road after all it was made in CHINA. I wish they would let you know that right away. When I bought this fridge I thought I was buying a SMETA but instead I got a SMOD. I mean that’s not even a word,SMOD what kind of name is that?Plus I must admit pretty good product support. But in the end I had to figure out the problem myself.Now that I have had the fridge awhile I love it works great
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Great Style
customer_reviews.text: Love this Fridge. Clean and sleek. Love having the separate drawers. Ice is easy to access. Very quiet great style and design good value for $$$.
customer_reviews.author: SUSAN B

customer_reviews.title: How to test the ice maker?
customer_reviews.text: I like the refrigerator but it is not making any ice (day 1). I have verified that the water is turned on. How do i force it to fill the ice tray with water?
customer_reviews.author: Henri Daumas

customer_reviews.title: Nice high end refrigerator
customer_reviews.text: Awesome refrigerator so far. I've had it for a month. Company is awesome and good with customer service. Only complaint I have is the slow ice production. With one person using ice through out the day the refrigerator can not keep up. We have to make more ice using ice trays. Overall it's almost perfect and looks nice (high end). I never heard of this brand and took a chance and glad I did. It's also very quiet. I love that I ordered online and delivery was no problem. Refrigerator was really well packed for shipping. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my needs.
customer_reviews.text: The refrigerator is the perfect size for my needs. It’s quiet and the 2 drawer freezer is great for easy access to treats.
customer_reviews.author: rileysgma94

customer_reviews.title: Hooking up the ice machine is a pain
customer_reviews.text: Everything about this fridge is an upgrade. Only thing is that the water valve is a strange size and doesn’t fit with what we have in the wall. We bought an adapter but that one also did not do the trick. (This is just for the ice machine) - haven’t used the ice machine yet obviously but everything else is great.
customer_reviews.author: Mae Fairfield

customer_reviews.title: Middle drawer with ice maker instead of all the nonsense fungus growing water drip.
customer_reviews.text: It is very nice unit. 1) Amazon still did not replayed to me if I can add the warranty or not. Amazon, please do. 2) The shipping company is a trouble. They delivered furniture instead refrigerator after month waiting.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Schatz

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: There are no handles!!! Impossible to open doors. Horrible fridge, cheap bins and shelves. Hate it!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Very SLEEK SHINY beautiful Counterdepth refrig
customer_reviews.text: Go read my very detailed lengthy review on the other SMETA refig that has 3 reviews. This is a great style refig with a perfect smudge/smear free super nice finish. Ice maker in the top lower drawer. I've never used it......I dont use ice. This refig front door looks very nice since it has no h20/ice machine on the door. Those 2 features break down on many refrig anyhow. I never liked the look of it. Go see my longer review on other Smeta.
customer_reviews.author: Cricket

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: We’ve had our fridge for two years. Quite, seamlessly sleek , lots of room. And the ice maker works great! Fabulous purchase for the $$.
customer_reviews.author: Shane P

product_meta.title: SMETA 36 Inch Counter Depth French Door Refrigerator Bottom Freezer, Fingerprint Resistant, 20.66 cu ft Capacity, Stainless Steel
product_meta.description:
Model:Model No. HC-767WE 

Product Overview
This item is a good looking, quiet and affordable appliance, which is a necessity to your kitchen.
Using dual cycle air cooling system, this item creates a wonderful frost free environment for your food and drinks and avoids the spread of the odors.
The 20.7cu.ft. large capacity provides enough refrigerating and freezing room to your food, which can meet your family’s need.

Product Features
1.Deep door shelves - Holds bottles better to prevent spilling out and breaking when door opens. 
2.Silent slide design - Pull out crispers for quiet and easy access.
3.3D LED light - Store and access foods easily with subtle lighting that provides maximum visibility.
4.LED touch display - Get accurate readings and easily adjust the temperature of the item.
5.Auto make ice - Using Japanese water supply device with Ag+ filter block, this item can automatically make pure ice cubes by just adding water.

Warranty 
The product is shipped by truck, pls leave your phone no in order info for shipping. 
We can provide 12 Months warranty for our product. If there is any problem with the product, please contact us first, and we will try our best to give a 100% satisfying solution.
FBA shipping - Pls keep your phone unblocked during delivery and make sure your address is workable for big items to get through.
feature_bullets: French door refrigerator with large capacity 20.66 cu ft,providing clean area for large family
Sleek looking and modern design, the french door refrigerator is easily match with the decorate style of your house
The upper side-by-side refrigerator compartment keeps your foods, fruits, vegetables, drinks, seasonings fresh and well organized - Refrigerated Temperature 36℉~ 46℉
The bottom drawer-style freezer compartment to store frozen foods at an easy-to-reach level - Freezing Temperature 5℉~-11℉
Counter Depth, Frost-Free/Auto Defrost, Fngerprint Resistant, Humidity Controlled Crisper, Ice Maker, Door Open Alarm.

specifications.Special Features: Tempered glass, Ice maker, Fingerprint resistant
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars15 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
